network.enablePreviewDesc: Show confirmation dialog with change summary before syncing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Create an App in the developer console (Google Cloud, Dropbox Developers, Azure Portal) to get Client ID and Secret.
faq.a2: Simulates the transfer first. Shows a summary of additions, deletions, and updates before actual execution.
faq.a3: Access tokens and credentials are securely stored in your OS keychain (Credential Manager / Keychain).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
mv_cloud is a local-first application.

1. No Middleman: Direct transfer between your PC and cloud.
2. Secure Storage: Tokens stored in OS Keychain.
3. No Tracking: We don't collect usage data.
4. Open Source: Code is auditable on GitHub.
